title: tirumukha maNDala
sahitya:
tirumukha maNDala darishanam kaNDiDil tIrum en kOTi janma vinaigaL


anupallavi

  shuruL kuzhalpuraL nudal tilaka azhagum naru campakam nigar nAci azhagum
 muruval oLirum shevvAyidazh azhagum karuNai vizhiyum kamalak-kuNDala shevi tigazh


caraNam    kOsalai kaNDu kaLitta mukhak-kamalam kArikai sItai mayakkum mukhak-kamalam
 kAniDai shabari kaNDa mukhak-kamalam karuttil vaikkum anbar kANat-tavikkum
